Text: Generally speaking when there are that many seeds and no comments it means it works and the install was uneventful (no errors, virus warnings, pop-ups, etc.) But as a more direct answer, yes, this one works fine. Being as this is a virtualization utility and not teh new haxorz game or w/e it's not surprising you don't a lot of comments. The people that would need this probably won't need to ask silly questions about how to use it.
thanks mate very good download + very fast download was running at 2.2mb/sec only took about 10 mins to download
dude it works great! im hoping to successfully run ubuntu/chrome os on VMware so i can have multiple OS while saving HD space!
just a question, when I start VMware, it sais there's an update available, am I safe to update VMware, or will it become unusable after that?

@hel000: it's probably best not to attempt an update in case it checks for a valid serial upon doing so. This version should work fine for anything you need it to do, and when some major new features come out, you can be sure that someone will have a new download for you to use. 

Just waiting for it to finish downloading now, thanks for seeding guys!
I tried the other ones and this is the one that actually works. Thanks!
